definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: sit, sit up, possibly also recline (cf. Ar. jalasa sit up; so Thes De al. (not Ew))—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[גׇּֽלִשׁוּ]]([[שֶׁ]]) Ct So 4:1, So 6:5 [[שֶׁגׇּלְֽשׁוּ]] [[גִּלְעָד]] ([[הר]])[[מ]] of flocks of goats, in sim. of a woman's hair; construction & sense rather awkward.
